snippet.title: Mega City Police | Release Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://bit.ly/3YeNuPQ

The crime is out of control, the streets are not clean. There are criminals and psychopaths everywhere, ready to cut anyone’s throat. A corrupt megacorporation squeezes the life out of the citizens, seeking to establish control all over the city. Only the incorruptible police officers of Mega City Police Department stand fast before the crime wave that consumed the city and threatens to overwhelm society!

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
